name: Double Purpose Triple Layer
description:
Double Purpose Triple Layer was created for GMTKJam.

Your goal is to reach the bottom of the screen.

Controls:

Press SPACE to end the tutorial.
Up, W, Z, S, Down and Space to jump
Left, A and Q to move or mine to the left
Right, D and E to move to the right
Escape to exit
R to reset

Controls while jumping:
Up, W, Z, S, Down and Space to destroy the ground below
Left, A and Q to attack down to the left
Right and D to attack down to the right
